title: Famed Mountain Lion Settles In Under Los Angeles Home
teaser: A mountain lion named "P-22," known to prowl the Hollywood Hills, is something of a local celebrity in the Los Angeles area.
contentencoded:
A mountain lion named "P-22," known to prowl the Hollywood Hills, is something of a local celebrity in the Los Angeles area. And like any celebrity worth his salt, he inspired a media frenzy earlier this week when he made a cameo appearance beneath a home in LA's Los Feliz neighborhood.
